mapper.select: SELECT A.ID,A.START_TIME,A.END_TIME,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT,A.IMPORTANCE_VALUE, B.OPTION_DESCRIPTION AS IMPORTANCE_DESCRIPTION,A.URGENCY_VALUE,C.OPTION_DESCRIPTION AS URGENCY_DESCRIPTION, A.`STATUS`,D.OPTION_DESCRIPTION AS STATUS_DESCRIPTION FROM SYS_USER_TASK A LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_OPTION B ON A.IMPORTANCE_VALUE = B.OPTION_VALUE LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_OPTION C ON A.URGENCY_VALUE = C.OPTION_VALUE LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_OPTION D ON A.`STATUS` = D.OPTION_VALUE WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}
